name: Croix de Bois - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: Croix de Bois from Ceccotti Collezioni blends traditional original charm with modern minimalist design, reinterpreted by DRAW Studio in 2014 to exude a sculptural presence. Made from North American walnut with a complex-looking structure formed of six identical interlocking hand-polished wood pieces. Options available in various sizes and heights with tabletops in clear, polished or smoked tempered glass, or polished brass, and some models also offering a marble tabletop.
